comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

New commits:
    
    commit 861f986d6fb960c55844afdff5e2199acfa9a76f
    
    do it

Patch Set 1: CI-Testing-1

"make check" exited with status 2

 fatal: ref HEAD is not a symbolic ref
 json: error: input is not JSON: Expected ',' instead of '"' at line 5, column 3:
           "repository": {
         ..^
 version is: { name: sdc-clients, description: node.js client libraries for Triton core REST APIs., version: 13.0.0 repository: { type: git, url: git://github.com/joyent/node-sdc-clients.git }, main: ./lib/index.js, dependencies: { assert-plus: ^1.0.0, async: ~0.9.0, backoff: ^2.4.1, bunyan: ^1.8.1, clone: 0.1.8, jsprim: 1.4.1, lomstream: 1.1.0, once: ^1.3.1, restify-clients: ^1.6.0, vasync: ^1.6.2, verror: ^1.6.0, sshpk: ^1.10.1, smartdc-auth: 2.5.2 }, devDependencies: { ldap-filter: ^0.3.1, moray: git+https://github.com/joyent/node-moray.git#fd5781bc25a9bfe2ba82167664639753fb9f0ca5, tape: ^4.6.0, uuid: 3.1.0 }, engines: { node: >=0.8.14 }, license: MPL-2.0 }
 [[ `cat package.json | json version` == `grep '^## ' CHANGES.md | head -2 | tail -1 | awk '{print $2}'` ]]
 json: error: input is not JSON: Expected ',' instead of '"' at line 5, column 3:
           "repository": {
         ..^
 Makefile:56: recipe for target 'versioncheck' failed
 gmake: *** [versioncheck] Error 1

Patch Set 2:

New commits:
    
    commit cbd669e22aee5a37fc5dbec81f7f70c9c53d415a
    
    fix syntax error

Patch Set 2: CI-Testing+1

"make check" passed ok

Patch Set 2:
